Name: Practice Makes Perfect
Description: Character learns something valuable and gains [BO] on next check with same skill.

Name: Lightweight
Description: Reduce encumbrance by 1.

Name: Sealable
Description: Armor can take the Vacuum Sealed attachment.

Mods.MiscDesc: Armor can take the Vacuum Sealed attachment.

Name: Lessons Learned
Description: Reduce difficulty of next crafting check by 1.

Name: Extra Melee Defense
Description: Add +1 melee defense to armor.

Name: Special Embellishment
Description: Add automatic [AD] to a chosen skill.

Name: Efficient Construction
Description: Retain supplies worth 50% of the Material Price.

Name: Extra Ranged Defense
Description: Add +1 ranged defense to armor.

Name: Extra Hard Point
Description: Add 1 hard point to armor.

Name: Extra Soak
Description: Add +1 soak to armor.

Name: Duplicate
Description: Create one additional, identical set of armor at no cost.

Name: Armor Schematic
Description: Permanently reduce difficulty of checks to create armor using this template by 1 (to a minimum of Simple [-]).

Name: Integral Attachment
Description: Add +1 hard point to armor, then install one applicable armor attachment that requires 1 hard point.

Name: Exhausting Effort
Description: Suffer 3 strain when finished with construction.

Name: Heavy
Description: Increase encumbrance by 1.

Name: Poor Fit
Description: Donning and doffing this armor requires one additional action.

Mods.MiscDesc: Poor Fit: Donning and doffing this armor requires one additional action

Name: Complex
Description: The armor is difficult to repair.  Increase difficulty of checks to repair armor by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Complex: Increase difficulty of checks to repair this armor by 1

Name: Difficult to Customize
Description: Increase the difficulty of checks to modify attachments on this armor by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Difficult to Customize: Increase the difficulty of checks to modify attachments on this armor by 1

Name: Restrictive
Description: Wearer adds automatic [TH] to checks with selected skill.

Name: Wear and Tear
Description: The tools used to make this armor are damaged 1 step(s).

Name: Fragile
Description: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the damage always counts as moderate unless it would be worse.

Mods.MiscDesc: Fragile: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the damage always counts as moderate unless it would be worse

Name: Expensive
Description: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the cost to repair is doubled.

Mods.MiscDesc: Expensive: Whenever armor becomes damaged, the cost to repair is doubled

Name: Supply Shortage
Description: Cannot finish until more supplies are acquired costing 25% of Material Price.

Name: Unexpected Flaw
Description: GM may spend 1 Destiny point to cause armor to fail and suffer major damage.  This can be exploited only once.

Mods.MiscDesc: Unexpected Flaw: GM may spend 1 Destiny point to cause armor to fail and suffer major damage.

Description: GM may spend [DE] from any combat check to have this weapon explode.

Name: Lightweight
Description: Reduce encumbrance by 1.

Name: Two-Handed
Description: The lightsaber becomes two-handed, increasing damage and encumbrance.

Name: Disguised
Description: Add [SE] to checks to identify the lightsaber.

Mods.MiscDesc: Disguised: Add [SE] to checks to identify the lightsaber as such when it is not ignited.

Name: Counterweight
Description: Increases encumbrance, gains Cumbersome instead of Unwieldy.

Name: Crossguard
Description: Lightsaber gains a crossguard.

Mods.MiscDesc: Crossguard: May spend [AD][AD] or [TR] to hook an opponent's blade and disarm them.

Name: Customizable
Description: Increase the lightsaber's hard points by 1.

Name: Delicate Balance
Description: Gains Unwieldy instead of Cumbersome.

Name: Personalized Design
Description: Crafter adds automatic [SU] on successful checks.  Others add [TH].

Mods.MiscDesc: Personalized Design: When the lightsaber's creator makes a successful Lightsaber check, an automatic [SU] is added.  All others add automatic [TH].

Name: Inbuilt
Description: Choose an item of encumbrance 1 or more that the character possesses.  This lightsaber will be built into that item.

Name: Energy Bleed
Description: Lightsaber gains the Stun 2 quality, or increases the Stun quality by 2.

Name: Fine-Tuned Emitter
Description: Add automatic [AD] to combat checks.

Description: Reduce difficulty of checks to modify installed crystals  by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Personalized Inlay: Reduce the difficulty of checks to modify any crystal installed in this lightsaber by 1.

Description: Add +1 hard point to lightsaber, then install one applicable attachment that requires 1 hard point.

Name: Heavy
Description: Increase encumbrance by 1.

Name: Exhausting Effort
Description: Suffer 3 strain when finished with construction.

Description: Increase difficulty of checks to repair lightsaber by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Fragile Casing: Increase difficulty of checks to repair this lightsaber by 1

Name: Awkward Grip
Description: Lightsaber gains the Unwieldy 2 quality, or increases the Unwieldy quality by 1.

Name: Misaligned Emitter
Description: Lightsaber requires a maneuver to ignite.

Mods.MiscDesc: Misaligned Emitter: Lightsaber requires a maneuver to ignite.  It can still be powered down as an incidental.

Name: Erratic
Description: GM may spend [DE] to damage hilt and wielder.

Mods.MiscDesc: Erratic: GM may spend [DE] to damage lightsaber one step and inflict 3 strain on wielder.

Name: Poor Focusing Lens
Description: Lightsaber gains Inaccurate quality, or decreases its Accurate quality.

Name: Faulty Inlay
Description: Increase difficulty of modifying lightsaber crystals

Mods.MiscDesc: Faulty Inlay: Increase difficulty of modifying lightsaber crystals installed in this lightsaber by 1.

Name: Tragic Accident
Description: Character suffers a Critical Injury upon completing the construction of the lightsaber.

Name: Unstable
Description: GM may spend [DE] from combat checks to short out lightsaber.

Mods.MiscDesc: Unstable: GM may spend [DE] from combat checks with this lightsaber to have it short out.  It remains inoperable until repaired with a Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check.

Description: (On a failed check) Crafter learns valuable techniques and gains [BO] on the next attempt to craft the hilt.  Does not need to purchase new materials.

Name: Horrible Accident
Description: (On a failed check) Hilt explodes, causing Critical Injury at +20 and destroying all materials.

Description: Reduce encumbrance by 1.

Description: Character learns something valuable and gains [BO] on next check with same skill.

Description: Increases the fortification's occupancy by 1.

Description: Add a useful feature to the fortification (add feature to description of fortification).

Description: Add a standard weapon to fortification.

Description: Increase the fortification's armor by 1.

Description: Suffer 3 strain when finished with construction.

Description: Fortification includes a critical flaw that an enemy can use to easily neutralize it.

Description: This fortification can protect for a limited number of attacks before it is rendered useless (GM's discretion).

Description: Gain [BO] on the next check made with the same skill duing this session.

Description: Increases the craft's silhouette by 1.

Description: Add 1 customization hard point to the craft.

Description: Increase crafter's Duty by two.

Description: Retain supplies worth 50% of the Material Price.

Description: Decrease the craft's silhouette by 1.

Description: Permanently reduce difficulty of checks to create a frame using this template by 1 (to a minimum of Simple [-]).

Description: Reduce the difficulty of checks to modify attachments on this vehicle by 1 (to a minimum of Easy ([DI])).

Description: Upon completing the Assembly step, character suffers 5 strain.

Description: When a charaacter attempts the Assembly step, upgrade the Mechanics check by one.

Description: Increase the difficulty of checks to repair this vehicle by 1.

Description: The GM may spend [TH][TH][TH] or [DE] that a character generates on a Piloting check with this craft to have it suffer the "Major System Failure" Critical Hit result.

Description: Increases the craft's speed by 1.

Description: Increases the craft's system strain by 1.

Description: Retain supplies worth 50% of the Material Price.

Name: Enhanced Power to Deflectors

Name: Easy to Repair
Description: Reduce difficulty of checks to repair Critical Hits on this vehicle by 1.

Description: Remove [SE] from Piloting checks caused by navigation hazards and difficult terrain.

Description: The GM may spend [TH][TH][TH] or [DE] that a character generates on a Piloting check with this craft to have it suffer the "Power Fluctuations" Critical Hit result.

Description: The GM may spend [DE] that a character generates on a Piloting check with this craft to have it suffer the "Engines Down" Critical Hit result.

Name: Fuel Hog
Description: When this craft suffers 1 or more system strain, it suffers that amount +1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Fuel Hog - When this craft suffers 1 or more system strain, it suffers that amount +1.

Name: Lessons Learned
Description: Gain [BO] on the next check made with the same skill duing this session.

Description: Increase the craft's encumbrance capacity by its silhouette.  This is doubled if the craft is a freighter.

Description: Increase the craft's armor by 1.

Description: Retain supplies worth 50% of the Material Price.

Description: Increase the craft's handling by 1 to a maximum of +3.

Name: Cargo Pods
Description: Increase the craft's encumbrance capacity its silhouette.  This is increased to 4x silhouette if the craft is a freighter.

Name: Integrated System
Description: Add +1 hard point to craft, then install one applicable vehicle attachment that requires 1 hard point.

Name: Schematic
Description: Permanently reduce difficulty of checks to create a hull using this template by 1 (to a minimum of Simple [-]).

Description: When a charaacter attempts the Assembly step, upgrade the Mechanics check by 1.

Name: Tight Quarters
Description: Add [SE] to checks made on board this craft.

Mods.MiscDesc: Tight Quarters - Add [SE] to all checks except Piloting and Gunnery while on board this craft.

Name: Loose Plating
Description: The GM may spend [DE][DE] that a character generates on a Piloting check with this craft to have it suffer the "Destabilized" Critical Hit result.

Name: Lessons Learned
Description: Gain [BO] on the next check made with the same skill duing this session.

Name: Improved Saftey Features
Description: Characters in vehicle suffer less wound and strain.

Mods.MiscDesc: Improved Saftey Features - Whenever a character in this vehicle would suffer wounds or strain from a Critical Hit the vehicle suffers, as a result of working on the vehicle, or other similar occurrences, the character suffers two fewer wound or strain, to a minimum of 1.

Name: Customized Controls
Description: Choose a pilot.  That pilot gains [BO] to Piloting checks made with this craft.

Mods.MiscDesc: Choose a pilot.  That pilot gains [BO] to Piloting checks made with this craft.

Name: Under Budget
Description: Retain supplies worth 25% of the Material Price.

Name: Distinctive Style
Description: Crew of this craft add [BO] to Charm, Coercion, and Negotiations checks made in the presence of the vessel.

Mods.MiscDesc: Distinctive Style - Crew of this craft add [BO] to Charm, Coercion, and Negotiations checks made in the presence of the vessel.

Name: Ahead of Schedule
Description: Reduce the time required for assembly by 25% (to a minimum of one hour)

Name: Masterful Construction
Description: If this craft ever suffers the "Vaporized" Critical Hit result, or otherwise be instantaneously destroyed, it instead suffers the "Breaking Up" Critical Hit.

Mods.MiscDesc: Masterful Construction - If this craft ever suffers the "Vaporized" Critical Hit result, or otherwise be instantaneously destroyed, it instead suffers the "Breaking Up" Critical Hit.

Name: Assembly Plans

Name: This is a Tough One
Description: Upon completing the Assembly step, character suffers 5 strain.

Name: Finicky Interface
Description: Increase the difficulty of checks to modify attachments to this craft by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Finicky Interface: Increase the difficulty of checks to modify attachments to this craft by 1

Name: Doesn't Look Like Much
Description: Decrease price that buyer is willing to pay for this craft by 50%.

Mods.MiscDesc: Decrease price that buyer is willing to pay for this craft by 50%.

Name: Complex Construction
Description: Increase the difficulty of checks to repair this craft once.

Mods.MiscDesc: Complex Construction: Increase the difficulty of checks to repair this craft once

Name: Specialized
Description: Choose an environment.  Outside this environment, pilot adds [SE] to Piloting checks made with this craft.

Mods.MiscDesc: Outside of chosen environment, pilot adds [SE] to Piloting checks made with this craft.

Name: Defective Seals
Description: GM may spend [DE][DE] generated by a Piloting check with this craft to have it suffer the "Major Hull Breach" Critical Hit.

Mods.MiscDesc: Defective Seals: GM may spend [DE][DE] generated by a Piloting check with this craft to have it suffer the "Major Hull Breach" Critical Hit.

Name: Fortifying
Description: Target heals 1 wound when consumed.

Mods.MiscDesc: Fortifying: Target heals 1 wound when consumed.

Name: Reviving
Description: Target heals 1 strain when consumed.

Mods.MiscDesc: Reviving: Target heals 1 strain when consumed.

Name: Draining
Description: Target suffers 1 strain when consumed.

Mods.MiscDesc: Draining: Target suffers 1 strain when consumed.

Name: Long-Lasting
Description: Increase duration by 1 hour (or round)

Mods.MiscDesc: Long-Lasting: Increase duration by 1 hour (or round).

Name: Careful Measuring
Description: Retain supplies worth 50% of the Material Price.

Name: Large Batch
Description: Brew up an additional dose of the potion

Name: Extra Potentcy
Description: Increase difficulty to resist potion by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Extra Potentcy: Increase difficulty to resist potion by 1, to a maximum of Formidable ([DI][DI][DI][DI][DI]).

Name: Recipe
Description: Permanently reduce difficulty of checks to create potion using this template by 1 (to a minimum of Simple [-]).

Name: Virulent
Description: Upgrade difficulty of resistance checks by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Virulent: Upgrade difficulty of resistance checks by 1.

Name: Empowered
Description: Potion has the same effect for an additional 1 round(s).

Mods.MiscDesc: Empowered: Potion has the same effect for an additional 1 round(s).

Name: Foul Taste
Description: User suffers 1 strain after benefiting from effects.

Mods.MiscDesc: Foul Taste: User suffers 1 strain after benefiting from effects.

Name: Vile Smell
Description: Characters add [BO] to detect use of the potion.

Mods.MiscDesc: Vile Smell: Characters add [BO] to detect use of the potion.

Name: Brief Effect
Description: Decrease duration by 1 hour (or round).

Mods.MiscDesc: Brief Effect: Decrease duration by 1 hour (or round), to a minimum of 1.

Name: Sloppy Brewing
Description: Cannot finish until more supplies are acquired costing 25% of Material Price

Name: Diluted Strength
Description: Reduce difficulty of resistance checks by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Diluted Strength: Reduce difficulty of resistance checks by 1, to a minimum of Simple(-).

Name: Empowered by Evil
Description: After consuming, user suffers 1 Conflict.

Mods.MiscDesc: Empowered by Evil: After consuming, user suffers 1 Conflict.

Name: Unexpected Side Effects
Description: GM may select effects of another potion and apply them to the target.

Mods.MiscDesc: Unexpected Side Effects: GM may select effects of another potion and apply them to the target.  Harmful potions get beneficial effects and vice versa.

Name: Draining
Description: Character suffers 1 strain after resolving effects of talisman.

Mods.MiscDesc: Draining: Character suffers 1 strain after resolving effects of talisman.

Name: Hidden Purpose
Description: Add [SE] to any checks made to determine talisman's true purpose.

Mods.MiscDesc: Hidden Purpose: Add [SE] to any checks made to determine talisman's true purpose.

Name: Growing Power
Description: Any enemy skill check required by this talisman has its difficulty increased by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Growing Power: Any enemy skill check required by this talisman has its difficulty increased by 1.

Name: Invigorating
Description: User recovers 1 strain after using talisman.

Mods.MiscDesc: Invigorating: User recovers 1 strain after using talisman.

Name: Careful Measuring
Description: Retain supplies worth 50% of the Material Price.

Name: Additional Power - Inflicted
Description: Amount of inflicted damage is increased by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Additional Power: Amount of inflicted damage is increased by 1.

Name: Additional Power - Reduced
Description: Amount of reduced damage is increased by 1.

Mods.MiscDesc: Additional Power: Amount of reduced damage is increased by 1.

Name: Clever Construction
Description: Construct an additional talisman using same materials.

Name: Redirect Energy
Description: User may make a single maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental when talisman's effects are resolved.

Mods.MiscDesc: Redirect Energy: User may make a single maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental when talisman's effects are resolved.

Name: Empowered - Single Use
Description: If talisman is one-use, can be used an additional 1 time(s) before being consumed.

Mods.MiscDesc: Empowered: Talisman can be used 1 additional time before being consumed.

Name: Empowered - Once per Session
Description: If talisman can be used only once per session, can be used an additional time per session.

Mods.MiscDesc: Empowered: Talisman can be used 1 additional time per session.

Name: Mighty - Remove Setback
Description: If talisman has an effect that removes [SE], it removes 1 additional [SE].

Mods.MiscDesc: Mighty: Talisman removes an additional [SE] from the check.

Name: Mighty - Add Setback
Description: If talisman has an effect that adds [SE], it adds 1 additional [SE].

Mods.MiscDesc: Mighty: Talisman adds an additional [SE] to the check.

Name: Mighty - Add Boost
Description: If talisman has an effect that adds [BO], it adds 1 additional [BO].

Mods.MiscDesc: Mighty: Talisman adds an additional [BO] to the check.

Name: Noticeable
Description: Force users add [BO] to checks to determine that talisman is a crafted item and not just decorative jewelry or an ornamental keepsake.

Mods.MiscDesc: Noticeable: Force users add [BO] to checks to determine that talisman is a crafted item and not just decorative jewelry or an ornamental keepsake.

Name: Cumbersome
Description: Talisman increases encumbrance by 1.

Name: Bad Feeling
Description: User suffers 1 Conflict after using talisman.

Mods.MiscDesc: Bad Feeling: User suffers 1 Conflict after using talisman.

Name: Sloppy Integration
Description: Cannot finish until more supplies are acquired costing 25% of Material Price

Name: Hard to Control
Description: User must make a Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Discipline check as an out-of-turn incidentalin order for the talisman to activate

Mods.MiscDesc: Hard to Control: User must make a Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Discipline check as an out-of-turn incidentalin order for the talisman to activate

Name: Empowered by Evil
Description: User suffers 2 Conflict after using talisman.

Mods.MiscDesc: Empowered by Evil: User suffers 2 Conflict after using talisman.

Name: Twisted Fates
Description: User must spend a Destiny Point to use talisman.

Mods.MiscDesc: Twisted Fates: User must spend a Destiny Point to use talisman.

Name: Failure to Activate
Description: GM can spend 2 Destiny Points to have the talisman fail to work.

Mods.MiscDesc: Failure to Activate: GM can spend 2 Destiny Points to have the talisman fail to work.
